mapper.insert: insert into topic values( #{topic_no}, #{topic_name}, #{topic_confidential}, #{topic_explain}, 'null', null, null )
mapper.select: select count(topic_name) from topic inner join ( select topic_no from topic_member where team_no= #{team_no} )T on topic.topic_no = T.topic_no where topic.topic_name = #{topic_name}
select * from (select topic_no from topic_member where team_no = #{team_no} order by topic_no) where rownum <=1
select topic.* from (select topic_no from topic_member where team_no = #{team_no}) tm inner join topic on topic.topic_no=tm.topic_no order by topic.topic_no
select * from topic_member inner join member on topic_member.member_no = member.member_no where topic_no = #{topic_no}
mapper.update: update topic_member set topic_member_position='토픽소유자' where topic_no = #{topic_no} and member_no=#{member_no}
mapper.delete: delete from topic_member where topic_no=#{topic_no} and member_no =#{member_no}
